title: Damar Hamlin Conspiracy - Illuminati hand signs during recent sighting
cleaned_text:
Hamlin attended the Bills-Bengals game Sunday afternoon at Highmark Stadium … his first time back at an NFL game since he went into cardiac arrest on the field in Cincinnati on January 2.

Damar, wearing a mask, hoodie, and sunglasses, was shown on television and the stadium scoreboard but between the accessories and bad weather in Buffalo, it was difficult to see Hamlin.

Hamlin didn’t speak with the media, and his face wasn’t seen clearly, and when he first came into the stadium in the side -by side atv they purposely blocked the camera for a full clear view of his face.

The speculation went viral on the web when the following hand signs were used which most conspiracies relate to the Illuminati. So can we be sure this is just a psyop or something more? Did he really die on the field that day? Many people think so but watch the video below:
